filmography.title: The Return of the Vampire
filmography.role_description: A young woman targeted by a vampire (Bela Lugosi) and his werewolf assistant during the London Blitz.
filmography.plot: A vampire is unearthed in London during World War II and seeks revenge on the family that destroyed him.

filmography.title: Cry of the Werewolf
filmography.role_description: A gypsy princess who inherited the curse of lycanthropy and rules over a secret cult in New Orleans.
filmography.plot: A gypsy queen turns into a wolf to kill those who trespass on her family's crypt.

filmography.title: A Song to Remember
filmography.role_description: The devoted childhood sweetheart of Frédéric Chopin who waits for him while he is seduced by fame and George Sand.
filmography.plot: The biography of Polish composer Frederic Chopin and his relationship with writer George Sand.

filmography.title: Escape in the Fog
filmography.role_description: A woman recovering from shock who has a premonition of a murder and helps agents stop a spy ring.
filmography.plot: A navy nurse dreams of a murder before it happens and gets involved in a Japanese espionage plot.

filmography.title: My Name Is Julia Ross
filmography.role_description: A young woman hired as a secretary who wakes up in a remote mansion, drugged and told she is the wife of a wealthy man.
filmography.plot: A woman is kidnapped and forced to assume the identity of a murderer's dead wife in a gaslighting scheme.

filmography.title: I Love a Mystery
filmography.role_description: A wealthy socialite who fears her husband is plotting to kill her in this adaptation of the popular radio serial.
filmography.plot: The detectives Jack, Doc, and Reggie are hired by a woman who believes a secret society is trying to murder her.

filmography.title: The Dark Past
filmography.role_description: The gun moll of an escaped convict who holds a psychiatrist and his family hostage.
filmography.plot: A psychiatrist uses psychoanalysis to disarm a fugitive killer who has taken over his home.

filmography.title: The Undercover Man
filmography.role_description: The supportive but worried wife of a Treasury agent who is hunting down a powerful mob boss.
filmography.plot: A federal agent aims to bring down a mob boss by investigating his tax evasion schemes, putting his family at risk.

filmography.title: Johnny Allegro
filmography.role_description: The beautiful wife of a criminal mastermind who falls for an undercover agent sent to infiltrate the organization.
filmography.plot: An ex-gangster becomes an agent to stop a counterfeiting ring operating from a private island.

filmography.title: St. Benny the Dip
filmography.role_description: A talented illustrator who helps three con men hiding out in a mission find redemption.
filmography.plot: Three confidence men disguise themselves as priests to evade the police and end up running a mission.

filmography.title: An American in Paris
filmography.role_description: A wealthy, sophisticated American heiress in Paris who acts as a patron to Gene Kelly's artist, expecting romance in return.
filmography.plot: Three friends struggle to find work in Paris. Things become more complicated when two of them fall in love with the same woman.

filmography.title: Young Man with Ideas
filmography.role_description: A predatory drama student who tries to seduce a married lawyer, causing complications in his life.
filmography.plot: A shy Montana lawyer moves his family to Los Angeles to find success but gets entangled with a sultry student.

filmography.title: Scaramouche
filmography.role_description: The French Queen who acts as a patron and secret admirer of the hero in this swashbuckling adventure.
filmography.plot: In 18th-century France, a young man hides out in a commedia dell'arte troupe to exact revenge on a nobleman who killed his friend.

filmography.title: Sombrero
filmography.role_description: A beautiful woman caught in a romantic misunderstanding in this Technicolor musical set in Mexico.
filmography.plot: Three stories of love and conflict unfold in a Mexican village involving three couples.

filmography.title: Executive Suite
filmography.role_description: A loyal and efficient executive secretary who knows the company's secrets; the role earned her an Academy Award nomination.
filmography.plot: When a powerful CEO dies suddenly, a boardroom power struggle erupts to determine his successor.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Supporting Actress; Venice Film Festival: Win – Special Jury Prize

filmography.title: Illegal
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a detective who works as an assistant to a former D.A. turned mob lawyer.
filmography.plot: A district attorney resigns after sending an innocent man to the chair, then becomes a defense attorney for a racketeer.

filmography.title: You're Never Too Young
filmography.role_description: A teacher who unknowingly helps a man posing as a 12-year-old boy to escape a jewel thief.
filmography.plot: A barber's apprentice poses as a child to escape a murderer and hides out at a girls' school.

filmography.title: The Ten Commandments
filmography.role_description: The Egyptian princess who finds the infant Moses in the bulrushes and raises him as her own son.
filmography.plot: Moses discovers his Hebrew heritage and leads his people out of Egypt, facing the wrath of Pharaoh Rameses.

filmography.title: Three Brave Men
filmography.role_description: A naval officer involved in the defense of a civilian employee accused of being a security risk.
filmography.plot: A Navy Department employee is suspended after being accused of being a communist sympathizer and fights to clear his name.

filmography.title: Cash McCall
filmography.role_description: The calculating assistant manager of a hotel who tries to manipulate a business deal for her own gain.
filmography.plot: A business tycoon buys failing companies to turn them around, but complications arise when he falls for the daughter of an owner.

filmography.title: Spartacus
filmography.role_description: A shrewd, wealthy Roman matron who maneuvers through the political and social intrigues of the Republic.
filmography.plot: The slave Spartacus leads a violent revolt against the decadent Roman Republic.

filmography.title: Such Good Friends
filmography.role_description: The overbearing mother of a woman who discovers her husband's infidelity while he is in the hospital.
filmography.plot: A woman discovers her husband's secret life and affairs while he is in a coma following a minor surgery.

filmography.title: Mahogany
filmography.role_description: A demanding fashion agency supervisor who clashes with an aspiring designer played by Diana Ross.
filmography.plot: A struggling fashion design student from Chicago finds fame and fortune in Rome but loses touch with her roots.

filmography.title: Skin Deep
filmography.role_description: The critical mother of a womanizing, alcoholic writer who struggles to get his life back on track.
filmography.plot: A womanizing author's life spins out of control due to his alcohol addiction and inability to remain faithful.

filmography.title: Sliver
filmography.role_description: A tenant in a high-tech apartment building who adds to the mystery surrounding the voyeuristic landlord.
filmography.plot: A woman moves into an exclusive New York City apartment building that she soon discovers is rigged with hidden cameras.

filmography.title: Hush
filmography.role_description: The grandmother of a man who brings his pregnant girlfriend home to a nightmare mother-in-law.
filmography.plot: A young woman moves to her boyfriend's family estate, where she becomes the target of his obsessive and dangerous mother.

filmography.title: How to Deal
filmography.role_description: The wise grandmother of a cynical teenager dealing with romance and family issues; Foch's final film role.
filmography.plot: A teenager disillusioned by love tries to navigate her family's complications and her own budding romance.
